channel.title: Z-Scape
channel.description:
[center] [b][size=30pt]Restarted with 317Serv![/size][/b]
Z-Scape is a server I started after reading [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,327384.msg2676373.html#msg2676373]this[/url] post, I have decided to base it off [s]RS2D[/s] 317Serv because well, just because :P The server will be a revolution to modern private servers, in the end it should have just about as many features as modern wL derived servers do. It will have PKing, npc v player, hell, I might even throw in npc v npc. I will be posting screenshots as I get more features and may also post videos, [s]as of right now I have BASIC npc v player(Health crap is all fucked up), and a start on PvP[/s]. Well, I am not really good for long speeches so I'm going to stop at that, tomorrow I will start posting pictures and videos for all of you! By the way, we will have a custom written website/forums and it will all be integrated, I will probably never release the source because I would have to give you all the crap for the database and that's just a pain, you might get lucky though and ill give it to you.
[size=12pt][b]Z-Scape Team[/b][/size]
[ul][li]Razor69 - Server developer[/li] [li]xx qwertyuiop xx - Server developer[/li] [li]Scarecrows - Client developer[/li] [li]Pie`/Verj_ - Web developer[/li][/ul]
[size=12pt][b]Old Server Changelog[/b][/size] [code] 2/18/09 - Project Idea, brainstorm 2/19/09 - Items, equips, banking, trading, basic script parser, temporary site set up, npcs 2/20/09 - script parser, combat, skill menus, player saving/loading(writing for sql), [/code]
[size=12pt][b]Server Changelog[/b][/size] [code] 2/21/09 - Restarted with 317Serv [/code]
[size=12pt][b]Client Changelog[/b][/size] [code] 2/19/09 - Brainstorm 2/20/09 - Wrote Menu.java to handle the JMenu 2/21/09 - Website + quit menu items, hp above heads check box added 2/21/09 - Cache downloading set up, removed runescape logo loading from cache 2/22/09 - Multiple themes added [/code]
[size=12pt][b]Server Pictures[/b][/size] None yet.
[size=12pt][b]Client Pictures[/b][/size] Client log in screen [IMG]http://i264.photobucket.com/albums/ii168/scarecrow_ftw/theme.png[/img]
[/center]
Note to Mods: I was on the server. So I would take that as enough proof that he actually is making a server. -M.dog311

item.title: Z-Scape
item.dc:creator: @Razor69 Razor69
item.description:
@Razor69 wrote:

i have almost full pvp now(i realized I fucked up trading and need to changed a few packets around but w/e)

[code]package net.varek.rs2d.content.skills;
import net.varek.rs2d.event.AbstractDelayedEvent;
import net.varek.rs2d.model.;
import net.varek.rs2d.manager.;
import net.varek.rs2d.Main;
import net.varek.rs2d.Server;

/**

  • basic combat
    */
    public class Combat implements ISkill, SkillConstants {

    public static void npcAttack(int index, Player player){
    if(!NPCManager.isValid(index)){
    player.getActionSender().sendMessage(“I can’t reach that!”);
    }

     NPC n = NPCManager.getNPC(index);

 if(player.isAttackingNPC()){
     NPC n2 = player.getAttackingNPC();

     if(n2.getIndex() != index){
         player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You are already under attack!");
     } else {

     }
 } else {
     if(n.isUnderAttack()){
         n.addAttacker(player);
         player.setAttackingNPC(n);
     } else {
         n.addAttacker(player);
         player.setAttackingNPC(n);
     }

     World.getWorld().getDelayedEventHandler().add(new CombatDelayedEvent(player, 300));

     if(n.isMoveable()) n.setMoveable(false);
 }

    }
    public static void playerAttack(int index, Player player){
    if(!World.getWorld().playerIsValid(index)){
    player.getActionSender().sendMessage(“I can’t reach that!”);
    }

     Player p = World.getWorld().getPlayer(index);

 if(p.isAttackingPlayer()){
     Player p2 = p.getAttackingPlayer();

     if(p2.getIndex() != index){
         p.getActionSender().sendMessage("You are already under attack!");
     } else {

     }
 } else {
     if(p.isUnderAttack()){
         p.addAttacker(player);
         p.setAttackingPlayer(p);
     } else {
         p.addAttacker(player);
         p.setAttackingPlayer(p);
     }

     World.getWorld().getDelayedEventHandler().add(new CombatDelayedEvent(player, 300));
 }

    }

    public static class CombatDelayedEvent extends AbstractDelayedEvent {

     public CombatDelayedEvent(Player owner, int frequency){
     super(owner, frequency);
 }

 @Override
 public void run(){
     setInterval(1500);

     if(getOwner().isAttackingNPC()){  //TODO: add a check for player combat implement a player combat system
         NPC npc = getOwner().getAttackingNPC();
         if(!getOwner().getAttackingNPC().isDead() && !getOwner().isDead()){

             getOwner().increaseCombatCycle();

             if(!getOwner().isCombatCycleOdd()){
                 int hitAmount = net.varek.rs2d.util.RandomNumber.rand(1);
                 getOwner().decreaseHP(hitAmount);
                 npc.setAnimationID(0x326);
             } else {
                 int hitAmount = net.varek.rs2d.util.RandomNumber.rand(1);
                 npc.decreaseHP(hitAmount);
                 getOwner().setAnimation(new PlayerAnimation(0x326, 0));
                 getOwner().getAnimation().setChanged(true);
             }
         } else {
             cancel();
         }
     } else if(getOwner().isAttackingPlayer()){
         Player player = getOwner().getAttackingPlayer();
         if(!getOwner().getAttackingPlayer().isDead()){

             getOwner().increaseCombatCycle();

             if(!getOwner().isCombatCycleOdd()){
                 int hitAmount = net.varek.rs2d.util.RandomNumber.rand(1);
                 player.decreaseHP(hitAmount);
                 getOwner().setAnimation(new PlayerAnimation(0x326, 0));
                 getOwner().getAnimation().setChanged(true);
             } else {
                 int hitAmount = net.varek.rs2d.util.RandomNumber.rand(1);
                 player.decreaseHP(hitAmount);
                 getOwner().setAnimation(new PlayerAnimation(0x326, 0));
                 getOwner().getAnimation().setChanged(true);
             }
         } else {
             cancel();
         }
     } else {
         cancel();
     }
 }

 @Override
 public boolean cancel() {
     if(getOwner().isAttackingPlayer()){
         getOwner().setAnimation(new PlayerAnimation(-1,0));
         getOwner().getAnimation().setChanged(true);
         getOwner().setAttackingPlayer(null);
         getOwner().resetCombatCycle();
         terminate();
     } else if(getOwner().isAttackingNPC()){
         getOwner().setAnimation(new PlayerAnimation(-1,0));
         getOwner().getAnimation().setChanged(true);
         getOwner().setAttackingNPC(null);
         getOwner().resetCombatCycle();
         terminate();
     }
     return true;
 }

    }

    public static void processNPCCombat(NPC n, Player player){
    }
    }[/code]

Read full topic
